item.title: CVE-2018-0672|2024-08-05T03:35:48.727Z -- six%20apart%2C%20ltd. -- movable%20type
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Movable Type versions prior to Ver. 6.3.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
